participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and caring, Emily often puts others' feelings before her own and has a creative side.
participant_1.background: I hide things from my family to protect them. favorite color is green. I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind. I worry about my image. my eyes are bright blue.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and passionate about food, Jake has a playful sense of humor and loves to share his culinary creations.
participant_2.background: I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee. I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend. I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. my favorite band is hop along. I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.

content.text: Hey how are you doing today?
I am doing well. Just got back from a trip to Salt Lake City.
Oh fun! I have always wanted to go there. Why did you go?
I went to visit my girlfriend. She moved there a few months ago.
Oh that is so sweet. Are you a chef?
Yes I am! I cook professionally.
What kind of cuisine do you cook?
I love to cook American cuisine. I love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
Kale is my favorite green! I love to eat it raw in salads.
I like to cook it with bacon and onions. It is so delicious.
That sounds amazing! I am going to have to try that.
You should! It is so good.
Do you have any other favorite foods?
Me too! But I have never gotten food poisoning from one.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest. It was so bad.
That sounds awful! I am glad you are okay.
